model.hand.representation

Interface HandInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Hand, HoldEmHand, OmahaHand, PineappleHand

    public interface HandInterface
    This interface defines a Hand that contains informations about the pot, the blinds, and the community cards.

    Each implementation of the hand also contains the ability to deal the initial hand to each player. The dealing capability was included in the hand to utilize abstraction when creating a hand.

    Since:
    9/26/16
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Emmet Murray
